scripts.db:test: node -e "const { Client } = require('pg'); const client = new Client({ host: '127.0.0.1', port: 5432, database: 'tourest', user: 'postgres', password: 'password123' }); client.connect().then(() => { console.log(' Conectado a PostgreSQL'); return client.query('SELECT version()'); }).then(res => { console.log(' PostgreSQL:', res.rows[0].version); client.end(); }).catch(err => { console.error(' Error:', err.message); });"
